languages.text: "Что ж ты с этого не начал{mf||а}?!" {n}Свирепая и тупая гримаса сменяется издевательской ухмылкой.{/n} "Так, думал{mf||а}, я отреагирую на твои слова? Помани кровожадного убийцу запахом бойни — и он побежит, куда укажешь?"

"Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"
languages.original_text: "Что ж ты с этого не начал{mf||а}?!" {n}Свирепая и тупая гримаса сменяется издевательской ухмылкой.{/n} "Так, думал{mf||а}, я отреагирую на твои слова? Помани кровожадного убийцу запахом бойни — и он побежит, куда укажешь?"

traits.locale_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start? I'm all for it!" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start? I'm all for it!" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start? I'm all for it!" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: “你怎么不一开始就这么问呢？”{n}他露出了嗜血而野蛮的表情，随后变成了嘲讽的笑容。{/n}“你以为我会这么回答吗？你以为，只要让嗜血的杀手闻到鲜血的味道，他就会听从你的吩咐，不顾一切地冲出去吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"

traits.locale_text: “你怎么不一开始就这么问呢？我当然想了！”{n}他露出了嗜血而野蛮的表情，随后变成了嘲讽的笑容。{/n}“你以为我会这么回答吗？你以为，只要让嗜血的杀手闻到鲜血的味道，他就会听从你的吩咐，不顾一切地冲出去吗？”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: 「なぜ最初からそう言わない？」{n}鈍い野蛮な表情が、嘲るような笑みに変わった。{/n}「何を期待してたんだ？血に飢えた殺人鬼の前に殺戮の気配を漂わせれば、すぐに食いつくとでも思ったか？」
languages.original_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ最初からそう言わない？」{n}鈍い野蛮な表情が、嘲るような笑みに変わった。{/n}「何を期待してたんだ？血に飢えた殺人鬼の前に殺戮の気配を漂わせれば、すぐに食いつくとでも思ったか？」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: «¿Y por qué no lo ha dicho desde el primer momento?». {n}Su expresión de salvajismo descerebrado da paso a una sonrisa burlona.{/n} «¿Es eso lo que esperaba? ¿Pensaba que solo tenía que ofrecer al sanguinario asesino el olor de la masacre y se marcharía a hacer su voluntad?».
languages.original_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y por qué no lo ha dicho desde el primer momento? ¡Claro que me animo!». {n}Su expresión de salvajismo descerebrado da paso a una sonrisa burlona.{/n} «¿Es eso lo que esperaba? ¿Pensaba que solo tenía que ofrecer al sanguinario asesino el olor de la masacre y se marcharía a hacer su voluntad?».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: « Il fallait le dire tout de suite ! » {n}D'abord sauvage, son expression se transforme en un sourire moqueur.{/n} « Vous vous attendiez à quoi ? Vous pensiez vraiment qu'il suffirait d'attirer le tueur sanguinaire avec l'odeur d'un massacre pour qu'il fasse vos quatre volontés ? »
languages.original_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"

traits.locale_text: « Il fallait le dire tout de suite ! Je vous suis ! » {n}D'abord sauvage, son expression se transforme en un sourire moqueur.{/n} « Vous vous attendiez à quoi ? Vous pensiez vraiment qu'il suffirait d'attirer le tueur sanguinaire avec l'odeur d'un massacre pour qu'il fasse vos quatre volontés ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: "Warum habt Ihr das nicht gleich gesagt?" {n}Dann wechselt sein Ausdruck beschränkter Wildheit zu einem spöttischen Grinsen.{/n} "Was hattet Ihr erwartet? Dachtet Ihr, Ihr müsst dem blutrünstigen Killer nur den Geruch der Schlacht unter die Nase halten, damit er losrennt und macht, was Ihr wollt?"
languages.original_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum habt Ihr das nicht gleich gesagt? Ich bin voll dafür!" {n}Dann wechselt sein Ausdruck beschränkter Wildheit zu einem spöttischen Grinsen.{/n} "Was hattet Ihr erwartet?" Dachtet Ihr, Ihr müsst dem blutrünstigen Killer nur den Geruch der Schlacht unter die Nase halten, damit er losrennt und macht, was Ihr wollt?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"

languages.text: "Niye en baştan öyle demedin?" {n}Duygusuz yabani ifadesi, alaycı bir sırıtışa dönüşüyor.{/n} "Ne bekliyordun? Kana susamış bir katile katliam kokusu aldırınca onu emirlerine koşturacağını mı sandın?"
languages.original_text: "Why didn't you say that at the start?" {n}His expression of dull savagery then changes to a mocking grin.{/n} "What did you expect? Did you think you would waft the scent of slaughter under the bloodthirsty killer's nose, and it would rush off to do your bidding?"

traits.locale_text: "Niye en baştan öyle demedin?" {n}Duygusuz yabani ifadesi, alaycı bir sırıtışa dönüşüyor.{/n} "Ne bekliyordun? Kana susamış bir katile katliam kokusunu taşıyınca onu emirlerine koşturacağını sanmıştın?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
